En este programa se verán historias verídicas de asesinatos hechos por contrato.En cada capítulo de la serie, se narra la historia de un trabajo profesional que trata de cómo se contacta, las instrucciones dadas al asesino para llevar a cabo las peticiones del cliente.

programme.title: Venga la alegría
programme.desc: Un programa de entretenimiento matutino que te alegran las mañanas, con la conducción estelar de la pareja Fernando del Solar e Ingrid Coronado, el programa cuenta con secciones tales cómo:- Ingrid habla con los peques- Cocina de Yolo- Baila con Alegría- Los especialistas- Noli y sus tips- El autobús de Danilo- Las rapiditas de Venga la Alegría- La LiliparodiaEl programa empieza con un tema bailable donde los presentadores y sus chicas bailarinas te ayudan a que te animes y llegue la alegría.Durante todo el programa se dan pistas sobre una palabra o frase que el televidente puede concursar para ganarse un premio.

programme.title: Broken Ties
programme.desc: Just when it seems Haya will agree to cooperate with the police in exchange for getting to meet her long-lost brother, someone tries to eliminate her. The baby trafficker reconnects with Audrey. (Repeat).

programme.title: Broken Ties
programme.desc: The meeting between Audrey and the baby trafficker gets worse by the minute. Haya gets to meet her long-lost brother whom she hasn't seen in decades, but in exchange, she must wear a wire and go on a fateful rendezvous with Maryuma the middlewoman. (Repeat).

programme.title: Broken Ties
programme.desc: The Spanish police raids the home of a childless firefighter who came in contact with the baby trafficker, looking for a kid. Afraid she won't return from the undercover operation alive, Haya asks to see her brother to say goodbye. (Repeat).

programme.title: Broken Ties
programme.desc: Ami finds Haya and learns he has been taken off the case. Bakhar takes charge and divulges information to Haya about her brother. Audrey worries that someone in the police is trying to cover the tracks of an incident connected to the case. (Repeat).

programme.title: Broken Ties
programme.desc: Maryuma's house holds additional women as prisoners. The Israeli and Spanish police forces are on alert in anticipation of the flight. Audrey begins to suspect there is more to the story than baby trafficking. Tensions rise between Sandra and Shlomi. (Repeat).

programme.title: Broken Ties
programme.desc: Ami and Audrey meet for the first time in Spain. The van with the women is taken to the thick of the forest and the surveillance gets complicated. Asaf decides to exact revenge on Maayan's assailants. (Repeat).

programme.title: Broken Ties
programme.desc: Haya arrives at the women's farm and realizes something's gone wrong, while Ami continues searching for her in the woods. Audrey receives an unexpected visit and Asaf finds himself in hot water. (Repeat).

programme.title: Broken Ties
programme.desc: Asaf and Maayan try to flee the country. Audrey finds out who is behind the Yo-yo moniker. Ami gets caught while looking for Haya at the women's farm. (Repeat).

programme.title: Broken Ties
programme.desc: A pregnant homeless woman living in Tel Aviv is recruited against her will by a police investigator to serve as an undercover agent in an international crime investigation involving the trafficking of newborn babies. (Repeat).

programme.desc: As details come to light about Haya's mysterious past, Ami tries to convince her to cooperate with the police. Audrey, a Spanish detective, manages to get in touch with a man who traffics babies on the dark net. (Repeat).

programme.title: R.M.N.
programme.desc: After quitting his job in Germany, Matthias goes back to his home village in Romania. He's pulled back into the daily life of his family members. He gets closer to his son Rudi, hoping to improve his education and rectify his beliefs about the world. He also reconnects with his ex Csilla who runs a factory busy with conflicts. (Repeat).

programme.title: Biosphere
programme.desc: Ray and Billy are best friends living in a carefully constructed, self-sufficient dome shelter in a post-apocalyptic world. Fitted with a hydroponic garden and a plentiful pond, the shelter supplies them with fresh vegetables and fish. When the fish begin dying mysteriously, Ray and Billy face an uncertain future. (Repeat).

programme.title: What Comes Around
programme.desc: Eighteen-year-old Anna has an online boyfriend in Eric, who claims to be just a slightly older college student. But when they meet, he turns out to be twenty-eight, which disturbs Anna's mother Beth. But Anna is smitten and continues to see him, despite their age difference. But when Eric reveals his intentions and his past with Beth, the relationship turns into a dark game with Anna as the prize. (Repeat).

programme.title: Murder at Yellowstone City
programme.desc: A former slave who arrives in Yellowstone City, Montana, a desolate former boomtown now on the decline, looking for a place to call home. On that same day, a local prospector discovers gold - and is murdered. (Repeat).

programme.title: Muzzle
programme.desc: When LAPD K-9 officer Jake Rosser's dog Ace is killed in a Skid Row shootout, Rosser vows to get to the bottom of the killing. This results in him being taken off the force and blocked by Internal Affairs, who are at the root of a conspiracy. Determined not to give up, Jake teams up with a new partner - the titanium-toothed Socks - a violent K-9 with an unknown past. Together, the two work to break up the conspiracy, get to those behind it, and, most importantly, exact revenge for Ace's death. (Repeat).

programme.title: Barbarians
programme.desc: A civilized dinner party in a country house sees four friends, Lucas, Adam, Chloe, and Eve, coming together for a birthday celebration. As the night progresses secrets and lies force themselves into the light and polite pretensions are dropped. A knock at the door reveals three masked intruders with an agenda of their own. Will their friendship stand the test? Can they survive the night or will their secrets eventually catch up with them? (Repeat).

programme.title: Clean
programme.desc: A man living peacefully in self quarantine discovers a troubling spot. (Screamfest) (Repeat).

programme.title: No Way Up
programme.desc: Characters from very different backgrounds are thrown together when the plane they're travelling on crashes into the Pacific Ocean. When the airliner comes to rest perilously close to the edge of a ravine with the surviving passengers and crew trapped in an air pocket, a nightmare fight for survival ensues with the air supply running out and dangers creeping in from all sides. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Last Breath
programme.desc: College friends reunite for a Caribbean dive trip, lured by the legend of a lost WWII battleship. Their dream dive turns deadly when a storm traps them inside the rusted wreck, surrounded by great white sharks. With air running out and nowhere to go, they wonder if they'll escape the watery tomb of the USS Charlotte. (New).

programme.title: Sympathy for the Devil
programme.desc: A man is hijacked while driving and is held at gunpoint by his unsuspecting passenger. It becomes clear that this mysterious passenger is in a dangerous game of cat and mouse, and the driver must now keep them both out of danger. As the night unfolds, the driver starts to realize that everything seems a little off. (Repeat).

programme.title: No Man of God
programme.desc: The complicated relationship that formed between the FBI analyst Bill Hagmaier and serial killer Ted Bundy during Bundy's final years on death row. (Repeat).

programme.title: Rubikon
programme.desc: A toxic fog pervades the Earth, demolishing all of humankind. A crew of astronauts in a space station must choose between returning home to check for survivors or staying afloat safely in space and surrendering to this new reality. What follows is a sci-fi adventure that pushes the boundaries of humanity during the apocalypse. (Repeat).

Z archiwum LaLiga

programme.title: Hugo Sanchez
programme.desc: Hugo Sanchez to symbol Realu Madryt drugiej połowy lat 80. Meksykanin był niezwykle skutecznym zawodnikiem - w sezonie 1989/1990 strzelił 38 goli i został najlepszym strzelcem Europy.

programme.title: Javier Irureta
programme.desc: Widzowie poznają biografię Javiera Iruretay, piłkarza Atletico Madryt i Athleticu Bilbao. Jako zawodnik Bask święcił triumfy w barwach Rojiblancos, zdobywając dwukrotnie mistrzostwo Hiszpanii.

programme.title: Andoni Zubizarreta
programme.desc: Był symbolem hiszpańskiej piłki przełomu lat 80. i 90. Andoni Zubizarreta miał na koncie najwięcej występów w reprezentacji kraju. Rysą na jego karierze był błąd na mundialu w 1998 roku.

Z archiwum LaLiga
programme.desc: Rywalizacja w LaLiga kojarzona jest z walką dwóch futbolowych gigantów - Realu Madryt z FC Barceloną, w których składach występowali najwięksi piłkarze świata. Liga hiszpańska to nie tylko El Clasico.

programme.title: Paco Gento
programme.desc: Paco Gento to legendarny piłkarz Realu Madryt, który w ekipie Królewskich spędził blisko dwadzieścia lat. Przyczynił się do wywalczenia dwunastu tytułów mistrza kraju i sześciu Pucharów Europy.

programme.title: Miguel Soler
programme.desc: Niewielu hiszpańskich zawodników może pochwalić się tak bogatym i zarazem kontrowersyjnym CV, jak Miguel Soler. Piłkarz występował między innymi w RCD Espanyolu, FC Barcelonie i w Realu Madryt.

programme.desc: Autorzy programu prezentują sylwetki najlepszych piłkarzy w historii Primera Division.

programme.title: Hugo Sanchez
programme.desc: Hugo Sanchez to symbol Realu Madryt drugiej połowy lat 80. Meksykanin był niezwykle skutecznym zawodnikiem - w sezonie 1989/1990 strzelił 38 goli i został najlepszym strzelcem Europy.

programme.title: Javier Irureta
programme.desc: Widzowie poznają biografię Javiera Iruretay, piłkarza Atletico Madryt i Athleticu Bilbao. Jako zawodnik Bask święcił triumfy w barwach Rojiblancos, zdobywając dwukrotnie mistrzostwo Hiszpanii.

programme.title: Andoni Zubizarreta
programme.desc: Był symbolem hiszpańskiej piłki przełomu lat 80. i 90. Andoni Zubizarreta miał na koncie najwięcej występów w reprezentacji kraju. Rysą na jego karierze był błąd na mundialu w 1998 roku.

programme.desc: Omówienie najciekawszych wydarzeń ostatnich tygodni w najwyższej klasie rozgrywkowej w Hiszpanii. Będzie nie tylko na poważnie. W programie znajdą się też zabawne tematy związane z La Ligą.

programme.title: LaLiga Best 11
programme.desc: Twórcy programu typują najlepszą jedenastkę piłkarzy, którzy zapisali się złotymi zgłoskami w historii Primera Division.

programme.desc: Twórcy przedstawiają tradycje związane z ligą hiszpańską. Jedną z nich jest zwyczaj, według którego drużyny przyjezdne, przed meczem z Athletikiem w Bilbao, składały kwiaty pod popiersiem Pichichiego.
